searchMenuDescription: Search for a menu by title or description to assign it to this week's plan.
noMenuForCurrentWeek: You have not assigned any menus for this week yet.
noMenuForCurrentWeekDescription: Assign an existing menu or create a new one to start planning.
searchGroupDescription: Search for a group by title.
noSearchResultsDescription: No groups found for the search query. Try adjusting your search query and try again.
weekExpired: It is not possible to create a plan for the selected week.
weekExpiredDescription: The selected week has already passed, so you cannot create a plan.
selectTimezoneDescription: Choose a timezone to manage your weekly menu plan and other features that depend on time, ensuring accuracy across all schedules and reports.
updateTimezoneDescription: Updating your timezone will adjust all background operations such as reports, weekly menu plans, and other time-sensitive features to align with your selected timezone.
noTimezoneSelected: Nepasirinkta laiko juosta. Pasirinkite laiko juostą, kad galėtumėte tvarkyti savaitės meniu planą ir kitas funkcijas, kurios priklauso nuo laiko, užtikrinant tikslumą visose tvarkaraščiuose ir ataskaitose.
noWeeklyMenuFoundDescription: No weekly menus found. You probably don't have any created weekly menus yet. Go to the menu page and start creating weekly menus.
deleteWeekPlanMenuDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this week plan menu? This action cannot be undone.
publishWeekPlanMenuDescription: Are you sure you want to publish this week plan menu? This action cannot be undone.
unpublishWeekPlanMenuDescription: Are you sure you want to unpublish this week plan menu? This action cannot be undone.

emptyState.noClientsAssignedDescription: Assign clients to the respective menu for this week to fully manage orders each day.
emptyState.noGroupsAssignedDescription: Assign groups to the respective menu for this week to fully manage orders each day.

noGroupsFoundDescription: No groups found. You probably don't have any created groups yet. Go to the groups page and start creating groups.
oneClientPerWeekPlanMenu: One client can only be assigned to one weekly menu plan. If the client is already assigned to another plan individually or with a group, they cannot be assigned again.
